description.value: The vanaras of old were tricksters able to step across wide rivers or slip into impossibly small spaces. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enlarge] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shrink] once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can target only yourself and other vanaras with these spells.
